label: 東海道
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: One of the shichidō. In Nara times, it proceeded eastward through Yamato and the provinces of Iga and Ise. After the capital was moved northward to Nagaoka and then to Heian, the route of the highway changed as well. [七道、大和、伊賀、伊勢、長岡、平安]
